title: Free Boards signatures for anyone who wants one :)
body:
#PSA: I AM CLOSING UP SHOP. RIGHT NOW THE AMOUNT OF REQUESTS IS JUST TOO OVERWHELMING. IF YOU DID NOT RECIEVE ONE I AM SORRY!!!!!!!!!! If you really want one and think you will use it often, I will make you one for a dollar a piece (pay via paypal.) This way you can get the exact product you want and have a truly unique signature! For more information contact me through skype. My username is cmduplain. Thank you, and sorry to anyone who didn't get one!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hey everyone!

I'm a graphic designer looking for some experience. If you want a unique signature for your boards account, feel free to skype me and I can make you one very quickly. Here are some examples of previous work:

Done for JayHog1992

http://www.auplod.com/u/oupadl78575.png

Used this one on boards before I changed my name to The Dunk God.

http://www.auplod.com/u/louapd7522c.png

Heres one I recently made for my new name:

http://www.auplod.com/u/apudlo78592.png

if you want one let me know!

replies.body: I like it. Does it come in hot pink?
It comes however you want it :D

> [{quoted}](name=The Dunk God,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=25AtVA4k,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-03-26T15:40:20.346+0000)
>
> It comes however you want it :D

I want it in hot pink with glitter and sparkles and a heart over the i. Please and thank you.

I actually started it before hand (hehehe) this is how it turned out:

http://www.auplod.com/u/ulaopd785ed.png

If you want it changed lemme know

Thank you for recognizing. I'm just trying to pump as many out as I can. Trying out something for the community for once. It takes about 5-10 minutes to Type, download images, do layout/effects, and render out a linked thumbnail. Ive probably been doing this for a good 3-4 hours.

Can I get one as well? :D
Heavy and Metal please with some Mordekaiser for good measure^^
http://www.auplod.com/u/dpuaol78600.png

Wow, thanks!

http://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.auplod.com%2Fu%2Fdpuaol78600.png&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=425&height=800
HIT ME UP WITH THE MASTERPIECES
http://www.auplod.com/u/dloaup785f1.png

THE FREAKIN GOD!!

Thank you so much!


http://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.auplod.com%2Fu%2Fdloaup785f1.png&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=150
no prob babe! yours was really rough cus for some reason the workds midnight and karma just wouldn't match up together as a fancy font. Plam B turned out nicer imo

I'm sorry that mines was harder :( 

It still looks like a masterpiece. I swear I'm gonna spam this: 
http://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.auplod.com%2Fu%2Fdloaup785f1.png&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=150


I absolutley love it
######don't tell anyone but yours is my favorite!

######I sent a friend request so we can casually mate


http://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.auplod.com%2Fu%2Fdloaup785f1.png&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=150
######casually mating is the best :3
######Who doesn't know that?
You have done a pretty good job. +1!
Its a never ending job. I check notifications every hour and it just keeps pilling. IT NEVER ENDS I TELL YOU
May I have one? My name is a pun incase your wondering.
http://www.auplod.com/u/paoldu78622.png

Let's see now...

http://www.auplod.com/u/oupadl78575.png
Fresh!
Just some feedback and a request as a boards user, could you crop the empty space at the top and bottom so they're not too bulky?

Well he deserves a massive applause.

Claps loudly*

If it takes less than 5 minutes then something windy would be nice as i main Janna for like...ever? Yeah...idk how.
http://www.auplod.com/u/dploau7873a.png
{{champion:79}} pls!
http://www.auplod.com/u/adoupl7864e.png
dazzle me buddy could it include zed was one of my first champions and loved him since, and um.. if you do make one, how would i copy it?

http://www.auplod.com/u/aodpul7862d.png

click on this^ and then copy the link it displays. If you paste it in a comment it will automatically show up
These look amazing, can I get one please?
http://www.auplod.com/u/aupodl7862b.png
Well time for me to jump on this bandwagon and ask for a signature.
dude for real. I come on and 18 NOTIFICATIONS. Where do I even start.
This looks fun, whaddya got?
http://www.auplod.com/u/alodpu78611.png

http://images5.fanpop.com/image/answers/2518000/2518772_1332006032721.85res_439_300.jpg

give me 10 minutes ;)
Feel kind of bad, overloading this guy with so many requests.

Please, don't feel bad! Graphic Design and Digital Arts has been my passion for 5 or 6 years now and I love to do it. 

I am more worried about missing out on someones request then I am about the actual work load. I want to make sure everyone gets a signature if they want it. It is hard to manage the request because they are flowing in pretty fast and are not very well organized. I'm only 14 years old so handling it is a bit rough, but making sure everyone gets one is my priority. 

Again, Don't feel bad about the requests, I love doing this. I just hope I can get one out to everyone who wants one.
Could you make me one? GigglesO, I play mostly morde. Hue hue hue.
http://www.auplod.com/u/opluda78605.png

> [{quoted}](name=The Dunk God,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=25AtVA4k,comment-id=000a0000,timestamp=2016-03-26T18:32:38.243+0000)
>
> http://www.auplod.com/u/opluda78605.png

I like it, and I don't really want to complain, but could I have something a little more serious, and a little less hue? I just made it to plat from gold 5 (started bronze) on only morde, and I'd like to still be seen as a troll, but I'd like to be seen as a serious troll, also if it isn't too much to ask dragon knight morde is my favorite, I really like the dragon on the back of his cape.

> [{quoted}](name=GigglesO,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=25AtVA4k,comment-id=000a00000000,timestamp=2016-03-26T18:40:32.241+0000)
>
> I like it, and I don't really want to complain, but could I have something a little more serious, and a little less hue? I just made it to plat from gold 5 (started bronze) on only morde, and I'd like to still be seen as a troll, but I'd like to be seen as a serious troll, also if it isn't too much to ask dragon knight morde is my favorite, I really like the dragon on the back of his cape.

Make sure to be specific when you ask for something man, otherwise you'll both be disappointed with the result, you with your sig, and him for not making you happy. Though I'm not one to talk, but hey.
You've got my attention :3 can mine have the red like in Eternum Rek'sai's skin?

http://www.auplod.com/u/dolpau7873d.png

Used the actual skin wallpaper for the texture

Hey, could you do one for me? Blueish white, watery texture, Capital T and W perhaps something fancy? And the 22 looking really badass! 

(Sorry, my wording is very poor, I understand if this isn't enough to go on, or is very unspecific and redundant, I just really want one of these cool signatures! Also, even if I didn't like mine for some strange reason please know I appreciate you taking time out of your day to put a smile on hundreds of strangers' faces including me.)

P.S. Don't tell anyone, but do you think you could include something like Morphling from Dota 2 in mine? I know, blasphemy, but it'd be really appreciated! Gonna stop overloading you now, have a good day and I hope others can make you as happy as you are making us!

I don't have a Skype or mic but if you could just make it how you want that'd be awesome too. c:

I'm a Teemo main, so make it... evil... but cute. >:3
Wow awesome! Could I have one? :) Also, you're super cool for just taking the time to make them.

http://www.auplod.com/u/oulpad78678.png

this one was fun to make. Tried to be creative. Probably my favorite on this thread.

EDIT: I truly hope your name is 'Cube'ism not 'Cub'ism
